result.execSummary:
The defendant Jorian D Bruce was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fin.Trans.Card-Fraudulent Use (<=$2500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.41(5)(a)1b.
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Theft-False Representation <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Restitution to be paid Joint and Several as a condition of probation.
Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.
Expunction is conditionally granted upon verification of completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.

No Contact with the victim or any other co-actors listed in the criminal complaint.

Collection may include income assignment.

Filed.

Defendant Jorian D Bruce in court, in custody, with attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.   Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Amended information filed by the State. Defendant enters a no contest plea to counts #1, 3, and 4 of the amended information. Court performs plea colloquy and finds defendant guilty of counts #1, 3, and 4 of the Amended Information. State gives sentencing recommendations. Atty Weathers makes statements regarding sentencing. Defendant makes Statements. Defendant may be returned forthwith. Defendant was sentenced to the following.

COUNT#1:

WITHHELD SENTENCE

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR  ***TRANSFER ALLOWED TO MILWAUKEE COUNTY**	***CONCURRENT TO OTHER COUNTS AND TO PROBATION IN WASHINGTON COUNTY***

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
____AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;
____Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
____No contact with: victim or any other co-actors listed in the Criminal Complaint. 
____Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

RESTITUTION:  $1,865.00 (joint and several, to be paid as a condition of probation - restitution to be paid before costs or fines)

CONDITION TIME: 30 days-Non-working hours with standard release conditions, STAYED, for use of agent with court permission. 

Expunction is conditionally granted upon verification of completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.

COSTS:  $243.00 + $200.00 DNA surcharge (to be paid as a condition of probation)

COUNT#2:

WITHHELD SENTENCE

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR  ***TRANSFER ALLOWED TO MILWAUKEE COUNTY**	***CONCURRENT TO OTHER COUNTS AND TO PROBATION IN WASHINGTON COUNTY***

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
____AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;
____Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
____No contact with: victim or any other co-actors listed in the Criminal Complaint. 
____Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Expunction is conditionally granted upon verification of completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.

COSTS:  $243.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation)

COUNT#3:

WITHHELD SENTENCE

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR  ***TRANSFER ALLOWED TO MILWAUKEE COUNTY**	***CONCURRENT TO OTHER COUNTS AND TO PROBATION IN WASHINGTON COUNTY***

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:

____Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
____No contact with: victim or any other co-actors listed in the Criminal Complaint. 
____Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

Expunction is conditionally granted upon verification of completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations.

COSTS:  $253.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation)
